messages.subject: Governmental Carrots
messages.msgSnippet: The link below is a very interesting article from an economics e-zine regarding the government s use of free stuff to lure HSers back into their clutches.
messages.messageBody:
The link below is a very interesting article from an economics e-zine regarding the government's use of "free" stuff to lure HSers back into their clutches. It puts an intriguing spin on things.

http://www.fee.org/vnews.php?nid=222

Katy C.


Don't worry about the world coming to an end today.

It's already tomorrow in Australia. --- Charles Schultz
